description: Adds or updates tags for the specified Kinesis data stream. You can assign up to 50 tags to a data stream. If tags have already been assigned to the stream, AddTagsToStream overwrites any existing tags that correspond to the specified tag keys.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A set of up to 50 key-value pairs to use to create the tags. A tag consists of a required key and an optional value. You can add up to 50 tags per resource. (string) --- (string) ---
